comments.Description: Allows creation of instant invites

comments.Name Note: These permissions require the owner account to use two-factor authentication when used on a guild that has server-wide 2FA enabled.
comments.Description: Allows kicking members

comments.Name Note: These permissions require the owner account to use two-factor authentication when used on a guild that has server-wide 2FA enabled.
comments.Description: Allows banning members

comments.Name Note: These permissions require the owner account to use two-factor authentication when used on a guild that has server-wide 2FA enabled.
comments.Description: Allows all permissions and bypasses channel permission overwrites

comments.Name Note: These permissions require the owner account to use two-factor authentication when used on a guild that has server-wide 2FA enabled.
comments.Description: Allows management and editing of channels

comments.Name Note: These permissions require the owner account to use two-factor authentication when used on a guild that has server-wide 2FA enabled.
comments.Description: Allows management and editing of the guild
Allows for the addition of reactions to messages
Allows for viewing of audit logs
Allows for using priority speaker in a voice channel
Allows the user to go live
Allows guild members to view a channel, which includes reading messages in text channels and joining voice channels
Allows for sending messages in a channel and creating threads in a forum (does not allow sending messages in threads)
Allows for sending of /tts messages

comments.Name Note: These permissions require the owner account to use two-factor authentication when used on a guild that has server-wide 2FA enabled.
comments.Description: Allows for deletion of other users messages
Links sent by users with this permission will be auto-embedded
Allows for uploading images and files
Allows for reading of message history
Allows for using the @everyone tag to notify all users in a channel, and the @here tag to notify all online users in a channel
Allows the usage of custom emojis from other servers
Allows for viewing guild insights
Allows for joining of a voice channel
Allows for speaking in a voice channel
Allows for muting members in a voice channel
Allows for deafening of members in a voice channel
Allows for moving of members between voice channels
Allows for using voice-activity-detection in a voice channel
Allows for modification of own nickname
Allows for modification of other users nicknames

comments.Name Note: These permissions require the owner account to use two-factor authentication when used on a guild that has server-wide 2FA enabled.
comments.Description: Allows management and editing of roles

comments.Name Note: These permissions require the owner account to use two-factor authentication when used on a guild that has server-wide 2FA enabled.
comments.Description: Allows management and editing of webhooks

comments.Name Note: These permissions require the owner account to use two-factor authentication when used on a guild that has server-wide 2FA enabled.
comments.Description: Allows management and editing of emojis and stickers
Allows members to use application commands, including slash commands and context menu commands.
Allows for requesting to speak in stage channels. (This permission is under active development and may be changed or removed.)
Allows for creating, editing, and deleting scheduled events

comments.Name Note: These permissions require the owner account to use two-factor authentication when used on a guild that has server-wide 2FA enabled.
comments.Description: Allows for deleting and archiving threads, and viewing all private threads
Allows for creating public and announcement threads
Allows for creating private threads
Allows the usage of custom stickers from other servers
Allows for sending messages in threads
Allows for using Activities (applications with the EMBEDDED flag) in a voice channel

comments.Name Note: See Permissions for Timed Out Members to understand how permissions are temporarily modified for timed out users.
comments.Description: Allows for timing out users to prevent them from sending or reacting to messages in chat and threads, and from speaking in voice and stage channels
